ygData.subject: The Glowing Stein is no more
ygData.msgSnippet: Since the Glowing Stein quest was mentioned in a couple of posts today,  I thought I would post this message that just came across the Brewers mailing list.
ygData.messageBody:
Since the Glowing Stein quest was mentioned in a couple of posts today, I
thought I would post this message that just came across the Brewers mailing
list. This will save some of you spending time, and the severe faction hit,
it takes to complete this quest.

Galtin of E'ci


> As posted from EQ Casters site
> http://eq.castersrealm.com
>
> <begin quote>
> As of Monday's patch on the Test Server, the Glowing Stein is no more.
>
> If you possessed it, it is now a Stein of Moggok. It is now a 7/43 1
> handed
> blunt weapon, and can only be carried in the primary melee slot (right
> hand).
> If you already had it in the secondary melee slot (left hand), then it
> will
> stay there until you remove it.
>
> Other than that, it is the same. MAGIC ITEM, and LORE ITEM. But it is NOT
> nodrop.
>
> </end quote>
>
> Looks like any item farmed is gonna be changed..
>
> So, stop wasting money on getting these things..
>
>
>
